name: Unstable Cargo
description:
Welcome to your peaceful life where you load Medicine, Wine and GUNS! You play as a Cargoman loading cargo onto pirate ships and deciding what to bring and what to leave behind. But make sure you don’t leave the wrong things, otherwise you may be out of a job (or a life).

Read your letters carefully to stay out of trouble. Or to get into trouble? I always forget which one.

Hope you have fun!
